Title: Protobuf Maven Plugin protocDigest is ignored when using protoc from PATH
Description: The expected `protocDigest` is ignored when protoc is taken from the `PATH`.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 3.10.2, all versions starting from 4.0.0 before 4.0.2
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 3.10.2 before 4.0.0, all versions starting from 4.0.2
